EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2018-11-29
EmailTemplate.subject: What PCF on AWS Can Do For You
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
November 29, 2018 <[[https://pivotal.io/partners/aws?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Pivotal Cloud Foundry on Amazon Web Services We're proud to have achieved Amazon Web Services container competency, just announced at this week's re:Invent. Check out what PCF on AWS can do for you. Learn More <[[https://pivotal.io/partners/aws?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-blog/when-it-comes-to-your-enterprise-transformation-journey-don-t-get-distracted-by-vanity-metrics?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> When it Comes to Your Enterprise Transformation Journey, Don’t Get Distracted by Vanity Metrics Mike Koleno and Ahu Chhapgar chat with Jeff Kelly about Citi's journey from monolith to microservices and how Solstice and PCF is helping them get there. Watch Now <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-blog/when-it-comes-to-your-enterprise-transformation-journey-don-t-get-distracted-by-vanity-metrics?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/videos/the-journey-to-becoming-digital-first-at-dbs-bank?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> The Journey to Becoming Digital-First at DBS Bank With the help of Pivotal, DBS began re-architecting around cloud-native principles in 2016, resulting in fundamental changes to how the bank does everything from hire developers to run its business. Take A Closer Look <[[https://content.pivotal.io/videos/the-journey-to-becoming-digital-first-at-dbs-bank?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://benchmark.builttoadapt.io/questionnaire?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://www.builtinseattle.com/2018/11/21/pivotal-new-seattle-office> Catered Breakfasts and Mountain Views Built in Seattle takes a look and tour of our new Seattle office. Check it Out <[[https://www.builtinseattle.com/2018/11/21/pivotal-new-seattle-office]]> <https://blog.dominodatalab.com/collaboration-data-science-data-engineering-true-false/> Collaboration Between Data Science and Data Engineering: True or False? Domino Data Lab's head of content, Ann Spencer, sat down with Pivotal alumni Don Miner and our own Marshall Presser to discuss the state of collaboration between data science and data engineering. Read the Interview <[[https://blog.dominodatalab.com/collaboration-data-science-data-engineering-true-false/]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/why-you-should-stop-looking-for-the-digital-transformation-easy-button-with-redapts-jeff-dickey?utm_campaign=content-social&utm_content=1543356949&utm_medium=social-sprout&utm_source=twitter?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Why You Should Stop Looking for the Digital Transformation "Easy Button" In this episode of Pivotal Conversations, Jeff Dickey, Chief Innovation Officer at Redapt, explains why there's no fast, seamless transition to digital transformation. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/why-you-should-stop-looking-for-the-digital-transformation-easy-button-with-redapts-jeff-dickey?utm_campaign=content-social&utm_content=1543356949&utm_medium=social-sprout&utm_source=twitter?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/cloud-native-data-architecture-break-away-from-data-monoliths-for-cloud-native-applications?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Cloud-Native Data Architecture In this SpringOne Platform session Anupama Pradhan of HCSC and Jeff Cherng of Pivotal talk cloud-native data architecture and breaking away from data monoliths for cloud-native applications. Watch the Video <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/cloud-native-data-architecture-break-away-from-data-monoliths-for-cloud-native-applications?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 12/04-12/05, SpringOne Tour, Paris <[[https://springonetour.io/2018/paris]]>
12/04, 10 Habits of Successful Digital Transformers, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/dec-4-10-habits-of-successful-digital-transformers-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletterr]]>
12/12-12/13, SpringOne Tour, Toronto <[[https://springonetour.io/2018/toronto?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
Check Out Upcoming Pivotal Training Courses <[[http://info.pivotal.io/UPBY0aJ0NU0ICz02nA030DG]]>
